metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9557 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Integer overflow in jas_image.c in JasPer before 1.900.25 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted file.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fix is too intrusive for stable releases, and there is no crash unless jasper is built with ASAN. For these reasons, we will not be fixing this issue. Marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: jasper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
